src:
Natakarica dobila napitnino življenja, kar je storila, vas bo presenetilo
Svoje delo ima zelo rada in bo delo natakarice tudi v prihodnje opravljala.
06 Nov 2019, 08:18 by N. Č.



Srečna dobitnica. FOTO: Instagram



Fotografija je simbolična. FOTO: Jure Eržen, Delo


»Stala sem pred aparati, pogledala za hip kuharico, nato ponovno listek in se začela smejati in jokati obenem,« je dejala 33-letna Taylor Russey, natakarica iz ameriške zvezne države Misuri, ko je izvedela, da je postala bogatejša za 50.000 dolarjev (45.000 evrov).


Srečna dobitnica. FOTO: Instagram

Da bi bilo veselje še večje, srečke Taylor ni vplačala sama, temveč jo je dobila za napitnino. Listek je vplačal moški, ki je redni gost lokala. Ta je sicer znan po tem, da osebju lokala za napitnino pusti kar loterijski listek. Povedala je, da službe ne bo pustila, denar pa bo porabila za popravilo zob.
text:
The waitress gets the tip of her life, which she did will surprise you
She loves her job and will continue to do the job of the waitress.
06 Nov 2019, 08:18 by N. Č.



Lucky winner. PHOTO: Instagram



Photography is symbolic. PHOTO: Jure Eržen, Delo


"I stood in front of the appliances, looked at the hip cookbook, then slipped again, and started laughing and crying at the same time," said 33-year-old Taylor Russey, a waitress from Missouri, when she learned she had made $ 50,000 richer ( $ 45,000).


Lucky winner. PHOTO: Instagram

To make the joy even greater, Taylor did not pay the meeting herself, but got it for a tip. The ticket was paid by a man who is a regular guest of the restaurant. The latter is known for leaving a lottery ticket to staff of the tip shop. She said she would not leave the service and would use the money to repair her teeth.
